item.title: Qeshm Island Trip
item.description:
First Day of Qeshm Trip - Train Stories and First Encounters #

Everything started in the morning of the first day. Mahdi and Mohammad came to pick me up, and I quickly packed my things. My mom had prepared some Bandari food for us, I grabbed it hot and ran to the door. We loaded the suitcases and headed towards the Isfahan train station. After putting our stuff through the X-ray machine, we walked towards the train.
